attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
should the vat man get money from food, some says yes some say no, i say all naturally organic grown foods and drinks should be vat free if its process free, does the vat man not want a healthy society, add vat to fast foods and processed foods not healthy foods,

help society become healthier not fast food outlets to get bigger

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
